translation.en: [man] I was a pretty cocky and arrogant kid.
I would tell anyone that would listen
that I was gonna be the best golfer in the world.
translation.zh: ‎我会成为世界上最好的高尔夫球手

translation.en: -[man 2] Growing up, watching Tiger Woods. -[man 3] Tiger!
[man 2] This guy's the same skin color as I am.
[reporter] Do you think you can win the Masters this week?
I do.
[man 4] The PGA TOUR is the pinnacle of men's professional golf.
translation.zh: ‎美巡赛是男子职业高尔夫的顶峰

translation.en: [woman] There's just a whole different level of competition.
[man 5] There are over 50 tournaments a year, with over 100 golfers at each event.
translation.zh:
‎每年有超过50场锦标赛
‎每场比赛有超过100位球手

translation.en: [woman] Any player will tell you.
You cannot emulate the feeling of a major championship.
[man 6] If you don't win a major, you can't be considered one of the all-time greats.
translation.zh:
‎如果你没有赢过大赛
‎就不会被当成最出色的高尔夫球手

translation.en: There's nothing like the life of a golfer.
translation.zh: ‎没什么比高尔夫球手的生活更棒了

translation.en: It's a traveling circus.
[announcer] This is starting to get interesting.
If you're gonna be a pro golfer, you have to accept that it'll be a wild ride.
translation.zh:
‎如果你想成为职业高尔夫球手
‎你必须接受这是趟疯狂的旅程

translation.en: Fuck are you doing!? Jesus.
-Joey! Tell Joey to move his fucking cart. -[man 7 laughs]
Oh no.
[man 8] One word to describe golf this year…
translation.zh: ‎用一个词来形容今年的高尔夫

translation.en: Disruption.
There is a power struggle going on in golf.
[reporter 2] Officials in Saudi Arabia are trying to create a new golf league
translation.zh:
‎沙特阿拉伯的官员们
‎正努力打造一个全新联赛

translation.en: to rival the PGA TOUR.
[man 6] LIV has offers out to some of the biggest names in the sport.
translation.zh: ‎丽芙邀请了运动界一些大人物

translation.en: Everything's got a price, I guess.
It's not really like anything that we've seen in sports before.
translation.zh:
‎这跟我们以前
‎在运动中见过的任何事都不同

translation.en: [woman 2] It's rattled the golf ecosystem, hasn't it?
translation.zh: ‎它扰乱了高尔夫的生态系统 对吧？

translation.en: Honestly, it's going to shape the future of professional golf.
translation.zh: ‎老实说这会影响职业高尔夫的未来

translation.en: [man 6] The golf world is teeming with storylines right now.
translation.zh: ‎高尔夫界现在充满了矛盾冲突

translation.en: [man 10] The game has never been more controversial than it is this year.
translation.zh: ‎比赛从没像今年一样具有争议性

translation.en: [man 8] I mean, they're pulling you in so many different directions.
translation.zh: ‎人们从不同方向拉扯着自己

translation.en: What's noise, and what's not noise?
You can't, almost, believe what's happening in the game.
translation.zh: ‎你不能总是相信比赛中发生的事

translation.en: I did not envision any of this happening.
It's a totally different situation now, and anything can happen.
translation.zh: ‎现在情况完全不同 一切皆有可能

translation.en: You have picked a hell of a year to start following the PGA TOUR.
translation.zh:
‎你们选择了波涛汹涌的一年
‎来记录美巡赛啊

translation.en: [man] Hey, Jill.
We just left the golf course, and we're gonna go to the airport,
translation.zh: ‎我们刚离开高尔夫球场 正要去机场

translation.en: and then we're gonna fly back home.
Yeah, we'll see you in a little bit.
-Can you guess the card for 1,000, Justin? -I'd love to.
translation.zh:
‎-你能猜中牌吗 赌1000 贾斯汀？
‎-来吧

translation.en: -Take a guess. -Seven of hearts.
Ace of clubs.
All right, one more guess.
[Thomas] I know exactly what it is.
I want the top card. It's an eight of hearts.
translation.zh: ‎我要最上面那张牌 红桃八

translation.en: Shit!
[Spieth] Yeah, maybe next time.
[announcer] Everybody's talking about the two amazingly talented freshmen,
translation.zh:
‎大家都在谈论
‎这两位横空出世的优秀新手

translation.en: Justin Thomas and Jordan Spieth.
translation.zh: ‎贾斯汀托马斯和乔丹斯皮斯

translation.en: [Thomas] I've played golf against Jordan since we were 13.
translation.zh: ‎我从13岁开始就和乔丹打高尔夫

translation.en: [announcer] Justin Thomas. Missed cue left.
translation.zh: ‎贾斯汀托马斯 左路打飞了

translation.en: We've grown up playing against each other, and we've just kept battling it out.
translation.zh: ‎我们从小就一起比赛 一直是对手

translation.en: [announcer] And Jordan Spieth in firm control.
translation.zh: ‎乔丹斯皮斯完全掌控了比赛

translation.en: [Thomas] I was very jealous of everything that Jordan did.
[Spieth] And how's second place feel for next week?
Pretty good?
[Thomas] I mean, you could go as far to say angry, because it's like it wasn't me.
translation.zh: ‎甚至可以说是愤怒 但我不是

translation.en: [announcer] One of the epic performances.
[announcer 2] The United States Open champion, Jordan Spieth.
translation.zh: ‎美国公开赛冠军乔丹斯皮斯

translation.en: [announcer 3] And the champion golfer of the year, Jordan Spieth.
translation.zh:
‎以及年度最佳高尔夫球手
‎乔丹斯皮斯

translation.en: [man] Jordan turned pro before JT did.
translation.zh: ‎乔丹比贾斯汀先成为职业选手

translation.en: Jordan was 21 years old and was number one in the world,
and JT's reputation at that time was kind of Jordan's friend.
translation.zh: ‎当时贾斯汀就只被看作是乔丹的朋友

translation.en: [Thomas] He's one of my best friends. We're always gonna pull for each other,
translation.zh:
‎他是我最好的朋友之一
‎我们总会对彼此加油

translation.en: but at the same time, you know, I hope that I beat him at every single tournament that we play in
translation.zh:
‎但与此同时
‎我也希望接下去的所有锦标赛

translation.en: for the rest of our life.
-[Thomas] What's up? -[man] How are you?
[Thomas] Good. How are you?
You're good. I got it.
Gotta make it seem like I can do something for myself every once in a while.
translation.zh: ‎总得让我感觉偶尔自己还有点用

translation.en: Just sometimes.
[man] We're not sure what direction he's gonna hit this yet.
-[kid laughs] -[Thomas] I did always wanna be a golfer.
What you got there? Oh!
[Thomas] I was probably a year and a half or so when I started screwing around with plastic clubs.
translation.zh: ‎我大概一岁半就开始玩塑料球杆

translation.en: [man] Oh! Good shot!
[Thomas] My dad…
[man] Oh, you gonna stretch a bit.
[Thomas] He's been a club pro for a long time.
translation.zh: ‎他做了很长时间的职业选手

translation.en: My grandpa was a PGA pro for 50-plus years.
translation.zh: ‎我爷爷当了50多年美巡赛职业球手

translation.en: If I look at the order, I should be able to find it. Yes, still here.
translation.zh: ‎如果看顺序 应该能找到 还在这里

translation.en: Looks like we started in '99, so he'd have been six years old.
translation.zh:
‎看来是从99年开始记录的
‎那时候他应该六岁了

translation.en: Kind of cool. Looks like we stopped in 2021.
Guess he reached the end there.
If I was going to play a sport, it wasn't gonna be anything other than golf.
translation.zh:
‎如果要我选择一项运动
‎肯定是高尔夫

translation.en: [man] One…
[woman] Two… [child] Three!
[man] Oh my goodness!
[Thomas] It just so happened this was, fortunately for me, the only thing I was good at.
translation.zh: ‎恰好也幸好 这是我唯一擅长的事

translation.en: Thank goodness.
[Thomas] So I pursued a career in it.
translation.zh: ‎所以我走上了职业高尔夫的道路

translation.en: [announcer] And Thomas with the finishing touches.
Third generation PGA professional.
translation.zh: ‎第三代美巡赛职业高尔夫球员

translation.en: [Thomas] Winning my first major was awesome.
translation.zh: ‎赢得我的第一个大赛冠军真是太棒了

translation.en: But, um, haven't won another since then.
translation.zh: ‎但从那之后我就再也没有赢过

translation.en: I'm eager. I'm ready. I know that I'm playing well enough to win.
translation.zh:
‎我很渴望 我准备好了
‎我知道凭我的实力可以获胜

translation.en: To be perfectly honest, just kind of pissed off I haven't gotten it done yet.
translation.zh: ‎老实说 我有点生气自己还没赢

translation.en: [man] How is your relationship with Jordan nowadays? Are you guys still tight?
translation.zh:
‎你现在和乔丹的关系怎么样？
‎还那么铁吗？

translation.en: Yeah, uh, he's the best man at my wedding. So I hope he'd say the same.
translation.zh:
‎对 他是我婚礼的伴郎
‎所以我希望他也会这么说

translation.en: Speaking of-- Jordan's calling me right now. What the hell does he want?
translation.zh:
‎真巧 乔丹给我打电话了
‎他到底想干什么？

translation.en: -Hey, man. What's up? -[Thomas] Hi, Jordan.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 老兄 怎么了？
‎-乔丹

translation.en: Do you think for my speech for your wedding,
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我在你婚礼上的致辞

translation.en: that I've already completed and memorized, obviously, and have an acting skit for,
translation.zh: ‎我已经写完并记住了 还准备了表演

translation.en: do you think there's anything I should avoid, or add in, or…
translation.zh: ‎你觉得有什么我该避免或添加的吗？

translation.en: [Thomas] Pretty much whatever your instincts tell you, avoid that.
translation.zh: ‎只要是你直觉想做的 都给我避免

translation.en: -Okay. All right. So stick to the script. -All right, see you.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 严格按照写好的词
‎-好了 再见

translation.en: Okay, buh-bye.
Sick.
JT and Jordan are two of my closer buddies out on tour.
translation.zh:
‎贾斯汀和乔丹是锦标赛里
‎我最好的朋友

translation.en: Yeah, I'd do just about anything for them.
-Here we are, for scorecard update. -Justin Thomas up one hundred.
translation.zh:
‎-来了 记分卡更新
‎-贾斯汀托马斯上升至100分

translation.en: Jordan Spieth down 60. Rickie Fowler down 60.
translation.zh: ‎乔丹斯皮斯60分 瑞奇福勒60分

translation.en: [Fowler] We're, in a way, kind of all out there and in it together.
translation.zh:
‎从某种意义上来说
‎我们是一条船上的人

translation.en: You do get a sense of satisfaction when you do see a friend succeed and play well.
translation.zh: ‎看到朋友成功并打好球时会有满足感

translation.en: But there's also kind of an underlying kind of kick in the butt, like…
I don't want to see him beat me. I wanna go beat him.
translation.zh: ‎我不希望他打败我 我想赢他

translation.en: [Fowler] One, two, three, birdies!
translation.zh: ‎一 二 三 小鸟球！

translation.en: When's the first time you met? Was it a golf tournament?
translation.zh:
‎你第一次见面是什么时候？
‎是高尔夫锦标赛吗？

translation.en: Yeah. It was here in Texas.
Our 2011 high school class was really strong.
I mean, there's probably a dozen guys that still have tour cards 10 years later.
translation.zh: ‎十年后大概还有十来个人有锦标赛卡

translation.en: So it was really competitive, and we were one and two in the country.
translation.zh:
‎所以竞争非常激烈
‎当时我们在全国排名第一和第二

translation.en: You know, when you watch both of them, their passion is to be the best,
translation.zh:
‎当你看着他俩时
‎他们的目标是做最第一名

translation.en: and Jordan just came out with that flash.
translation.zh: ‎乔丹以漂亮的成绩横空出世

translation.en: That's never gonna happen again.
It's not like Jordan's dropped off.
Winning that many majors early on, I mean, that's hard to continue to do that.
translation.zh:
‎这么年轻就多次赢得大赛
‎很难保持这种势头

translation.en: And then you have Justin Thomas, who's been getting better and better and better.
translation.zh: ‎然后贾斯汀托马斯也越来越强

translation.en: And you could say that Justin has closed the gap on Jordan.
translation.zh: ‎可以说贾斯汀缩小了和乔丹的差距

translation.en: But Jordan still has the potential to be great.
translation.zh: ‎但乔丹依然有潜力成为伟大的球手

translation.en: [Greller] That looked great.
[announcer] It is a gorgeous day.
The Harbor Town Golf Links.
The PGA TOUR so proud to present to you the RBC Heritage.
translation.zh: ‎美巡赛很荣幸为你呈现RBC传承赛

translation.en: [boy] You're my favorite golfer!
RBC Heritage, because of how early on in the year it is,
it can end up being a trampoline to the rest of the year.
translation.zh: ‎这个比赛会成为一整年的风向标

translation.en: [Renner] Every player plays with this confidence that you have to have,
translation.zh:
‎每个球手都要带着
‎无与伦比的自信打球

translation.en: that when they're playing their best, no one can beat them.
[Morikawa] You want to play well and win.
What I look for is just can we perform week in and week out?
translation.zh:
‎我思考的是
‎我们是否能每周都保持高水准？

translation.en: [Johnson] Every facet of your game has to be firing on all cylinders
if you want a chance to hold that trophy on Sunday.
translation.zh: ‎那所有方面都必须做到最好

translation.en: Yeah, I'm down. I'm around all week, dude. Let's tee it up.
translation.zh:
‎我来了 我整周都要在这里
‎我们来准备吧

translation.en: [Fitzpatrick] Success this season will be winning on the PGA TOUR.
translation.zh:
‎想要在本赛季取得成功
‎那就意味着要在美巡赛上获胜

translation.en: I want to get to world number one, just to prove to myself that I can do it.
translation.zh: ‎我想成为世界第一 证明自己能做到

translation.en: As a rookie, you definitely want to be known as the top dog in your class.
translation.zh: ‎身为新人 你肯定想跻身前列

translation.en: And my goal is to win Rookie of the Year.
translation.zh: ‎我的目标是赢得年度最佳新人

translation.en: Golf on the PGA TOUR is difficult, tiring. It's stressful.
translation.zh: ‎美巡赛的高尔夫赛很难 疲惫 压力大

translation.en: But we just know there's gonna be ups and downs. This game's a roller coaster ride.
translation.zh:
‎但我们都知道比赛有起有落
‎这个比赛就像坐过山车

translation.en: [Thomas] I just feel like if I just go for a weak left hand
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我只要左侧打轻一点

translation.en: and try not to dig, it's never really gonna get in trouble.
translation.zh: ‎不要集中地面 应该就没事

translation.en: [Thomas] If you're competitive and a good player,
translation.zh: ‎如果你好胜 还是个好球手

translation.en: all it takes is one week and your life changes.
[announcer] Next on the tee, from Louisville, Kentucky, Justin Thomas.
translation.zh:
‎下一个发球的是来自肯塔基州
‎路易斯维尔的贾斯汀托马斯

translation.en: [Renner] So a regular PGA TOUR event, it's four rounds. It starts on Thursday.
translation.zh:
‎在美巡赛中
‎常规比赛是四轮 星期四开始

translation.en: There's a full field around, let's call it, 150 players.
translation.zh: ‎首先是所有球手参赛 大概150名

translation.en: They play Thursday and Friday.
[announcer 2] This little one for the par.
-[man] Yeah, baby! -[applause] [man 2] Let's go! [man 3] Whoo! Whoo!
translation.zh: ‎（标准杆 每个洞标准入洞杆数）

translation.en: [Renner] Unlike other sports, you're trying to record the lowest score possible.
translation.zh:
‎跟其他运动不同
‎高尔夫比的是谁分数低

translation.en: From there, if you're not in that top 65 and ties, you have missed the cut.
translation.zh:
‎之后如果没有进入前65名
‎那就直接被淘汰

translation.en: -[crowd] Oh! -[announcer 3] That hurts a bit.
[Renner] You are not getting paid, and you're going home.
[Renner] This pressure just gets higher and higher as the days go on,
translation.zh: ‎随着时间流逝 压力也越来越大

translation.en: and then Sunday afternoon, we crown our champion.
translation.zh: ‎到了周日下午 就会诞生冠军

translation.en: [announcer] Thanks for joining us for the final round from Hilton Head.
translation.zh: ‎感谢各位参加希尔顿黑德岛的决赛

translation.en: [announcer] Got a chance…
[announcer] How about that. Jordan Spieth from the bunker.
translation.zh: ‎太厉害了 乔丹斯皮斯的沙坑球

translation.en: That's an eagle for him at the second hole.
He knows he's in this thing.
[announcer 2] He hasn't won since last April,
but he's looking to change that here today.
[announcer 3] JT. Really struggled with the putter this year.
[announcer] Well, that is a sloppy bogey for Justin Thomas.
translation.zh:
‎对贾斯汀托马斯来说
‎是个不太好的柏忌球

translation.en: [announcer 4] And he'll just be more annoyed than anything right there.
The biggest thing for me, in terms of weakness in my game, is just capitalizing
translation.zh:
‎我在比赛中最大的弱点
‎对我来说最重要的就是变现

translation.en: and trying to get some momentum,
you know, trying to get myself back in position and playing with that confidence.
translation.zh: ‎回到好的状态 带着自信打比赛

translation.en: [man] Let's go, Jordan. Win this thing!
translation.zh: ‎加油 乔丹 赢得比赛！

translation.en: [announcer] This, for a third eagle.
translation.zh: ‎这是第三个老鹰球 ‎是自昨天起的九球的延续

translation.en: Home.
[announcer 3] Just a struggle with fairways today, for sure.
[Spieth] I'm just trying to stay patient.
[announcer] Ah, he clipped a tree there.
[Spieth] It can be deflating sometimes.
[announcer 5] Hasn't won since THE PLAYERS Championship 2021.
translation.zh:
‎他在2021年
‎获得球员锦标赛冠军后还没赢过

translation.en: Been close, but he's still looking.
translation.zh: ‎距离很近 但他还在找角度

translation.en: [announcer] Spieth has 12 career wins, and two of 'em ended
translation.zh:
‎斯皮斯获得过12场职业球赛的胜利
‎其中两场的最后一球

translation.en: with a bunker shot at the final green.
Could he do it again?
Oh, seriously!
-What a shot! -[announcer 3] Yeah.
[announcer] Jordan Spieth breaks the winless drought.
Good for him. What a win.
[Spieth] Winning out here feels great.
But for me, it was more of a relief.
translation.zh: ‎但对我来说 这更像是松了一口气

translation.en: [man] Way to go, Jordan!
[Spieth] Once that happened, I've got some momentum.
translation.zh: ‎我获胜后 就会有乘胜追击的势头

translation.en: [girl] Jordan!
[crowd chanting] Jordan Spieth!
[Spieth] I mean, it's so easy to say you just gotta get over it, but it's always easier said than done.
translation.zh:
‎说克服低潮期很简单
‎但说起来容易做起来难

translation.en: [Spieth] I don't like the detach feeling.
Oh, no, no. I don't like that either.
It's like… That's why I try to hit some slow.
-So I can go like… -Yeah. I'll get a picture.
[Mike] I guess I could say I've been Justin's coach since day one.
translation.zh: ‎我想从一开始我就是贾斯汀的教练

translation.en: -Feels like I'm, like, back here. -[Mike] Yeah, let's just try one more.
translation.zh:
‎-感觉我在这里
‎-对 再试一次

translation.en: I mean, that's a difficult thing, being a parent and a coach at the same time.
translation.zh: ‎平衡做父母和做教练很不容易

translation.en: Look at the line on your shaft.
-I wanna see, like, my hands, like-- -Like how far out they go?
translation.zh:
‎-我想看看我的手
‎-看有多远吗？

translation.en: [Thomas] Fucking hate that, man.
[Mike] I mean, any time that he is in any state of discouragement
or something about any performance that he recently had,
it ultimately always comes back to, let's not forget you're pretty good too.
translation.zh: ‎其实关键是不要忘记自己也很厉害

translation.en: Everybody's going to have times where they don't perform
at the level they want to perform.
Do you remember the shoot we did out at, um…
[sighs] I want to say it was for Coca-Cola, in that old house out in Dallas.
translation.zh:
‎给可口可乐拍的那次
‎在达拉斯的旧房子里面

translation.en: Yeah, and there was one they were going to do something similar the year before,
translation.zh: ‎对 还有一年前他们也想做个类似的

translation.en: and then the weather was bad, it turned into the one when I was hitting shots on the…
translation.zh: ‎结果天气太糟糕 最后变成我打球了

translation.en: [Moses] That ended up being the best commercial. -Like, all the trick shots in the trailer. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎但那个广告最好
‎所有的技巧都展示出来了

translation.en: -[Moses] All right. -Thank you.
[Dethier] Obviously, the goal at every PGA TOUR event is to win,
translation.zh: ‎显然每场美巡赛的目标都是获胜

translation.en: but when guys actually do,
they don't just get the trophy and the first-place check.
translation.zh: ‎他们不只是拿到奖杯和第一名奖金

translation.en: -[man] So this is your fake home, huh? -Hmm?
-Yeah. -[man] This is your fake home?
It's really nice.
[Dethier] They get fame and notoriety and sponsor deals.
translation.zh: ‎他们得到名气 名声和赞助

translation.en: You went there to win a golf tournament, and you end up turning into a celebrity.
translation.zh:
‎本来是去赢高尔夫锦标赛
‎结果成了名人

translation.en: [man 2] So what we want to do is just be authentic to golf and be authentic to you
translation.zh:
‎我们想真实地展现高尔夫
